channel.title: Reflection - Hern [Experimental EP]
channel.description:
New EP, will probably be the last thing I post on Hern this year. Had a lot of fun working on this. This was originally going to be an album but I lost all of the samples I was using halfway through making it and lost motivation to make it an album, so I worked it in to an EP.
Link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/reflection
Hope you guys enjoy, constructive criticism is always welcome.
